author: Catherine McDonald
title: Queen Street West coffee shop frustrated by repeated robberies, suspect in custody
description: Cesario Ginjo grew up not far from the coffee shop and bakery he owns on Queen West, and says he loves the neighborhood. But lately, running a business there has been difficult.

author: Mark Naglazas
title: La vita bella: Can the Hay Street Mall reinvent itself as a cafe strip?
description: An Italian-style coffee shop is flourishing amidst the closed shops and gloom of the Hay Street Mall. Can it pave the way for a European-style café strip and foodie destination?

author: Prarthana Prakash
title: Fearing a repeat of Bud Light, U.K. government tells business leaders to stay away from politics and ‘woke’ culture wars
description: British brands like coffee chain Costa Coffee and shoe-maker Dr. Martens are entangled in the same kind of transgender controversy that has cost Bud Light parent Anheuser-Busch roughly $400 million in lost sales.

author: Vic Parsons
title: ‘In the UK’s trans-hostile climate, trans people pay too high a price for visibility’
description: Brands like Costa Coffee have begun showing people with top surgery scars in advertisements but is this kind of well-intentioned spotlighting truly helpful or does it create more difficulties for trans people?

author: Roger Dooley, Contributor
title: Target’s Starbucks Pickup To Boost Customer Convenience
description: Target is now letting customers orders Starbucks coffee and food for pickup via the Target mobile app.

title: Edinburgh coffee shops: New Matcha Mind cafe opens in Portobello's Brighton Place

title: 30 Under 30 Local 2023: Los Angeles
description: From the 28-year-old founder of Seoul Juice to the TikTok star known for bringing his coffee around the world, here are the young people reshaping fashion, food and the arts in Los Angeles.

title: A 4-year-old Whittier College orchard is harvesting coffee plants, and students are getting creative
